long story

skip to short

I am from Bangkok, Thailand and have been living in Brisbane since 2013.

I am a UIX Designer with front-end development skills and aim to be a UIX Engineer in the future with my skill sets.


My passion for creativity alongside the desire to solve problems has led me to become the bridge between design and frontend development. I am more focused on Design today but with my agility, I am able to pick up other skill sets when required.


I believe that learning is important and no matter the circumstances, as long as there is knowledge gained, nothing is lost.


My goal has been established towards what I do in my career and for the future, by finding solutions to problems and help those that helpless with technology and innovative solutions and designs.
